All Classes

Class
Description
Doctor
Doctor class, will have the logic for healing a player or themselves.
Game
Class Game is in charge of the entire game logic and game flow.
GameUI
GameUI class, runs the main panel that has the round number, whether it is day/night, player names with indices, buttons to interact with at the end of the game.
Mafia
Mafia class, has inner framer class because they are a part of the mafia.
Mafia.Framer
 
MafiaMessage
MafiaMessage implements message, part of the mvc, in charge of changing Mafia's message
MafiaUnitTesting
Class with unit tests for methods like getters and setters.
Message
Message interface, helps with the buttons
Play
Play: main class to run the game using the Game class which has main logic.
Player
Player class, keeps track of player index, username, whether they are alive, healed, targeted, framed.
Role
Role class: assigns the player list specific roles randomly depending on the number of players.
Sheriff
Sheriff class, has logic for interrogating players.
TownMessage
TownMessage implements message, part of the mvc, in charge of changing Mafia's message
Vigilante
Vigilante class, will have the logic for shooting a player or themselves.
Villager
Villager class, no special role, just helps to interact with villager players
